FROM meetwaarden 
WHERE mw_se_id = 1

    AND mw_timestamp <= "{{payload}}:23:59:59"

func:
var temp = msg.payload.replace("'\n", ""); //Only give the number
var query= `SELECT tk_temp FROM tijdklok WHERE tijdklok.tk_dag_nr LIKE '%vr%' AND tk_enable = TRUE AND tk_tijd = '`+temp+`';`;
msg.topic = query; //Put query into the msg.topic
return msg; //Return the query

name: Bereken
make whole day
verbruik
tijdstip
maaksql log error
GetGlobal
GetGlobal
sql maken
save RTT
func:
var RTT_vorig = flow.get('RTT_begin'); //dit is de waarde van gisteren 23:59
var RLT_now = flow.get('RLT_now');  //laag tarief nu
var RHT_now = flow.get('RHT_now');  //hoog tarief nu
var RTT_now = parseInt(RLT_now) + parseInt(RHT_now);    //totaal nu
var RTT_vandaag = parseInt(RTT_now) - parseInt(RTT_vorig);  //verbruik vandaag
global.set('RTT_vandaag',RTT_vandaag);  //opslaan
flow.set('RTT_begin',RTT_now);  //onthouden
msg.payload= RTT_now;
return msg;
